alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Palm Beach County through 615 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Palm Beach, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Palm Beach, Juno Beach, Royal Palm Beach, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Haverhill, Port Of Palm Beach, Golden Lakes, Schall Circle, Lake Belvedere Estates, Juno Ridge, Downtown West Palm Beach, Palm Beach International Airport, Royal Palm Estates, The Acreage, Mangonia Park and Lakeside Green. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
